title: ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today!
description:
Offering Studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center City Philadelphia Apartments near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history! ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on the National Register of Historic Places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown Philadelphia apartment near Rittenhouse Square? You've found it! ICON is the most exciting rental property to ever grace Rittenhouse Square. A quintessential example of the Art Deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, ICON's design is inspired by Art Deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that Philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, ICON is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the Great Depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both Cunard's White Star Line and the United States Lines, and the esteemed Pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th Floor. Today, this history echoes throughout ICON, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its Art Deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. title: ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today!
description:
Offering Studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center City Philadelphia Apartments near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history! ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on the National Register of Historic Places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown Philadelphia apartment near Rittenhouse Square? You've found it! ICON is the most exciting rental property to ever grace Rittenhouse Square. A quintessential example of the Art Deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, ICON's design is inspired by Art Deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that Philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, ICON is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the Great Depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both Cunard's White Star Line and the United States Lines, and the esteemed Pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th Floor. Today, this history echoes throughout ICON, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its Art Deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: Kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors. Stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. Glass-tile, kitchen backsplash. Quartz top kitchen island. Engineered hardwood flooring. Baths with sleek, high gloss cabinets and quartz countertops, glazed 12x12 porcelain tile. Air conditioning. Carpeting in bedrooms. Washer and dryer. Amazing views of Philadelphia. Enhanced Penthouse level finish on 23/24 floors. Venetian medicine cabinet. Wheelchair Accessible Apartments Available. 2 inch wood window blinds. Community amenities: Sky Deck with 360 View, Includes Grilling Station and Outdoor Living Area with Fireplace. Wellness Floor Featuring a Yoga Studio, Cardio, Weights, TRX & Boxing. Private Dining Room with Fireplace and Serving Kitchen. Club Level with Kitchen, Billiards, Flat-Screen TVs and Large Screen. Media Room for Private Parties. Business Center with Computers, Printers, Conference Rooms with A/V Capabilities. Media Room. Full Service Concierge. Parking Garage w/ Valet Parking Option. Package Receiving. Pet Grooming Station. On Site Property Management. Elevator. Charging Stations for Electric Cars. Cold Storage for Grocery Delivery. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance. Pets Welcome: $500 one-time fee. Max 2 pets per home. $35 / month pet rent. On-Site Green Drop Donation Box. ** Pricing and availability subject to change on a daily basis ** Photos are of model units ** Parking may be available for additional fee **
1616 Walnut St #1B-1904

As you enter 640 North Broad, you'll step away from the busy street and into an urban space that artfully blends the old with the new. title: 1101 Locust St #9A
description:
$3500 / month without parking, $3700 / month with parking.
1101 Locust St Unit 9A (corner unit) in the exclusive Western Union Condominiums is an 1,163 square foot condo with 2 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms with 10 ft ceilings, nestled in the heart of Center City's Wash West neighborhood adjacent to Thomas Jefferson University and Hospitals. Step out on your private balcony with unobstructed views of the Delaware River or look out your giant window to see William Penn's statue on City Hall. On cold nights you can snuggle up in front of the gas-burning fireplace. The kitchen features a large center island, granite countertops, gas range, and newer refrigerator, with new, dual-temp, under-counter wine cooler. Unit comes with new (2022) custom stackable ultra-heavy duty Speed Queen washer/dryer and a newer water heater. The master bedroom has a huge en-suite bathroom with his and hers vanities, separate tub and shower, and a walk-in closet. Both bathrooms are tiled with marble vanities. Light colored hardwood floors throughout the main living areas together with the wonderful natural lighting provides for a radiant living space. Bedrooms are carpeted. Unit comes with a deeded covered sedan parting spot in the underground garage with elevator access to the rest of the building. The building has 24/7 concierge, 24/7 attended underground parking, and a fitness center. There is Walgreens and a churrascaria restaurant in the building. The condominium is super pet friendly and even has its own fenced outdoor doggie run and treat bowl at the concierge desk. The location can't be beat, quiet, but just blocks from the theatre district, and easy walking distance to Rittenhouse Square, the Fashion District, Chinatown, Mom's Organics, and Whole Foods. There are literally dozens of restaurants within a three-block radius. Walk Score: 100, Transit Score: 100, Bike Score: 89. Schedule your appointment to see this fantastic space today!

______________________________________
Available 8/1/23! This sprawling 3 bed, 2 full and 2 half bath home is on a corner lot with gorgeous city-facing windows and features over 2,000 sq ft of living space, an attached garage, and an incredible private roof deck! Upon entering, you are greeted by the main living space that consists of uniquely designed 14' ceilings and the gourmet kitchen that overlooks the space through a contemporary sleek glass wall. Cooking and entertaining are made easy with quartz counter tops, two-toned kitchen cabinetry and high-end stainless steel appliances. A floating staircase leads to the second floor that features 2 generously sized bedrooms as well as a conveniently located full hall bath and laundry closet. Both bedrooms feature large closet spaces and ultra-large windows that display gorgeous views and maximum sunlight! The third floor boasts a large primary suite with city views and a luxury bathroom with a dual sink vanity and glass enclosed shower. Located just off the primary suite is a party powder room that is ideal for entertaining guests on your private roof deck that has amazing views. Downstairs before heading out to the garage, don't miss the fully finished basement - a bonus space that could serve well for storage, a home office or gym. Finally, you're sure to enjoy being situated just minutes from Center City, as well as the South Street/Grays Ferry bridges for quick commutes to University City, CHOP, Drexel, U-Penn, and more. Sorry, no pets. Roof deck furniture is available to incoming residents if interested.

title: Room for rent+living room large dining room kitchen and a full bath!
description:
Check out this stunning turn of the century Victorian home with a large apartment for rent. Conveniently located in the center of Lansdowne just a short walk to shops/restaurants, regional rail(5min walk), and Aldi grocery store. Heating electric and hot/cold water are paid by the landlord while the tenant is responsible for their cable/internet. One large A/C unit is included and keeps the main floor cool during the summer months. Heat is provided from cast iron radiators, which have been balanced throughout the property, with decorative covers.
As you approach your new apartment you'll be greeted by a property with a ton of character with its stunning color, spacious front porch, private yard, and a grand turret. Some of the unique features include a beautiful open staircase, large rooms throughout with 10ft ceilings, very well appointed kitchen, two full bathrooms, and lots of windows for natural light.
The main floor includes large living room large dining room kitchen and a full bathroom. You won't find a better appointed kitchen in an apartment with tons of counter space, glass top stove and dual ovens. The kitchen also features a bar height table that seats five and hardwood floor. The dining room has plenty of space to host family and friends for dinner parties and features a bay window overlooking Owen Ave. A spacious living room has enough space for a large TV and several couches so the whole family can enjoy a movie night together. An additional turret room with built in shelving for photos books or trinkets and 270 degree view of the neighborhood.
The master bedroom is absolutely huge with plenty of closet space and includes the 3rd floor turret where you can see 270 degrees over the entire neighborhood. Two additional bedrooms are quite large and have more than enough room for queen/king size bed plus additional furniture. A second full bathroom is at the end of the hallway with free laundry facilities tucked into a room off the bathroom.1 year lease, longer lease terms are available. $2400 security deposit and signed lease to secure the apartment. First months rent due at move-in and on the 1st each following month. Rent can be paid via personal check or electronically.IF INTERESTED, PLEASE SEND YOUR CONTACT NO !!!
